title: Flash 8 - Advanced Text Rendering Mode
content:
[Flash 8 Beta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019132126/http:/www.macromedia.com/software/flashplayer/public_beta/) has been announced with an "advanced" text anti-aliasing mode. [Try it here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019132126/http:/www.onebyonedesign.com/flash/f8/test1/) once you've installed the new version.

It does seem to make a significant difference.

(via the [Sitepoint.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019132126/http:/www.sitepoint.com/) newsletter.)

Ed.
author: edeverett
